articles.description: On the eve of the American Bicentennial, Tina Turner left her abusive husband Ike at the Hilton-Statler Hotel and dashed across I-30 to find refuge at a Ramada Inn.

DALLAS She's a global icon whose life changed right here in the City of Dallas. 
On July 3, 1976, Tina and Ike Turner's rocky marriage came to a head. They were in Dallas on the eve of the American … [+1662 chars]
